snippet: The American swimmer Ryan Lochte is poised to be the breakout star of the 2012 Summer Games, both in and out of the pool.
abstract: Profile of American swimmer Ryan Lochte, poised to be the breakout star of the 2012 Olympics, both in and out of the pool; in addition to training for the Olympics, where he plans to face off with the sport's reigning champ Michael Phelps, Lotche has been on a breakneck tour of national appearances and promotions.
lead_paragraph: The American swimmer Ryan Lochte is poised to be the breakout star of the 2012 Summer Games, both in and out of the pool.

headline.seo: Ryan Lochte, Olmypic Swimmer and Sex Symbol
headline.main: The Making of an Olympic Sex Symbol
headline.print_headline: The Making of an Olympic Sex Symbol
